Class AbstractJDOMUtil

java.lang.Object
emissary.util.xml.AbstractJDOMUtil
Direct Known Subclasses:
JDOMUtil, SaferJDOMUtil
public abstract class AbstractJDOMUtil extends Object
Utilities for dealing with JDOM documents
